Back to Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart

Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart

Sonata in F major, KV Anh. 135/547a

c. 1788 · KV1,2 Anh. 135 · KV3 547a/1–2 · KV6 547a

[Wikipedia] · [IMSLP]

Total duration: 9' 30"

  • 1. Allegro
  • 2. Rondo: Allegretto

This sonata is probably spurious. It is often paired with the variations in F major, KV 54/547b.

Recommended editions

  • Henle · HN 22 · Klavierstücke · ed. Ullrich Scheideler
  • Henle · HN 23 · Klavierstücke · ed. Ullrich Scheideler
  • Wiener Urtext · UT 50227 · Klaviersonaten / Band 2 · ed. Ulrich Leisinger

1. Allegro

This is an arrangement of the second movement of the violin sonata in F major (KV 547).

Duration: 8'

Difficulty: 3

2. Rondo: Allegretto

This is an alternative version of the final movement of the sonata in C major (KV 545).

Duration: 1' 30"

Difficulty: 2
